channel.title: BuildMaster News
channel.description: BuildMaster is a set of classes in Ruby to help easy the task of project building, releasing and website building

item.title: Website Redesigned
item.description: The document has been divided into three parts based on the three areas that BuildMaster covers

item.title: Buildmaster Snapshot Available
item.description: BuildMaster now can generates snapshots and upload them to the web through pscp automatically.

item.title: BuildMaster 0.9.1 Released
item.description: Fixed to work with all versions of subversion, cotta api updated with copy_to

item.title: BuildMaster 0.9.0 Released
item.description: Improved file operations and made BuildMaster more testable

item.title: BuildMaster 0.8.0 Released
item.description: Site Building part of the BuildMaster is now feature complete.

item.title: BuildMaster 0.7.0 Released
item.description: BuildMaster 0.7.0 Released with expression evaluation enhanced. Now document with relative paths can be generated so that it can be downloaded (with source)

item.title: WebSite Update
item.description: Website updated to push useful information forward

item.title: BuildMaster 0.6.0 Released
item.description: Second release of BuildMaster, with site testing ability

item.title: BuildMaster website created
item.description: BuildMaster website has been created by its own script

item.title: XTemplate script created
item.description: XTemplate script has been created, following the ones that is currently being used for jBehave and jMock

item.title: BuildMaster code structure created
item.description: BuildMaster project structure has been created with according files so that a gem can be created and released onto rubyforge

item.title: BuildMaster moved from RubyBuilder
item.description: RubyBuilder project has been deleted and renamed to BuildMaster to easy any confusion
